thread.title: Nick and Vanessa Lachey's Uber car in bad accident

author: foxnews.com
title: Nick and Vanessa Lachey's Uber car in bad accident
text:
Email Print (2015 Steve Granitz)
Nick Lachey's recent date night with his wife , Vanessa Lachey, definitely didn't go as planned.
The 41-year-old star Instagrammed a picture of a serious-looking car accident on Saturday, which he says happened while the couple was taking an Uber .
"A word of advice always wear your seatbelt when you @uber," Lachey wrote. "There is no such thing as a guaranteed safe ride. #datenight."
WATCH: Vanessa Lachey Reacts to Super Fit Pregnant Model Sarah Stage
On Sunday, he reassured his fans that he and Vanessa, 34, are OK.
"For the record, @VanessaLachey and I are both fine after our little @uber accident," he tweeted. "Just a sobering reminder to always buckle up!"
For the record, @VanessaLachey and I are both fine after our little @uber accident. Just a sobering reminder to always buckle up!
â€” Nick Lachey (@NickLachey) October 11, 2015
Thankfully, the couple's adorable children -- three-year-old son Camden John and ten-month-old daughter Brooklyn Elisabeth -- were left at home. Vanessa gave birth to their adorable daughter in January.
Still, we hope the mishap doesn't stop Nick and Vanessa's adorable date nights! The two have been married since July 2011, but still manage to look more smitten with one another than ever.
WATCH: 12 Celebrity Couples Who Can't Ever Get Divorced or We Will Lose All Faith in Love
Nick and Vanessa aren't the only celebrities to recently get into a car accident. Tyga and Kylie Jenner were involved in a car accident Friday in the rapper's new $320,000 Rolls Royce.
